attributes.action: strip Gordon Brown of his position &  pension rights in response to his cataclysmic handling of the UK economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown, whilst Chancellor, and now as Prime Minister, is arguably chiefly responsible for the UK's dire financial position. The 'court of public opinion' demands his incompetence be punished by immediate removal of office, including all associated pension rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
